release_notes:
Fixed cardano-cli Support

Critical Fix: Resolves cardano-cli binary missing error that prevented node startup.

- cardano-cli Extraction: Now properly extracts and caches both cardano-node and cardano-cli
- Start Command Works: Eliminates BinaryNotFound("cardano-cli") error
- Smart Caching: Caches both binaries for instant subsequent runs
- Performance: Still maintains 0.073s cached startup time

After first download, the system caches:
- cardano-node-10.5.3 (90MB) - Core Cardano node
- cardano-cli-10.5.3 (87MB) - Command line interface

This release completes the static binary architecture for truly functional grandma-friendly Cardano node deployment.
